name: Aventura Copilului Albastru și Urât
storyline:
It was a quiet afternoon when, out of nowhere, an explosion of dicks destroyed the world. Oh no, oh no! What can we possibly do?
Lucky for us, HE exists! -> The Blue and Ugly Child in action (after reading this, imagine a superhero theme song)
Alongside the Blue and Ugly Child, you'll have to find your way in this weird world created by the sick mind of Codrin Bradea. (As you can probably tell)

The game is all about weird dialogues with weird characters, and your duty, following the story (which totally exists), is to make the best decisions.
You have to survive, because post-apocalypse, probably everyone you meet will try to slit your throat.
You have to find food, because after the explosion, resources are limited.

You have to find your long-lost parents who you didn’t even know existed, and neither did I until halfway through making the game.
You have to d̶e̶s̶t̶r̶o̶y̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d̶. (Or do you?)

2 Good Endings, 1 Bad Ending,̶ ̶3̶ ̶S̶e̶c̶r̶e̶t̶ ̶E̶n̶d̶i̶n̶g̶s̶ ̶y̶ou'll ̶n̶e̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶f̶i̶n̶d̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶r̶.
But watch out! The paths you choose will stop you from doing all these things at once.
So you have to pick a single path. (Or just play the game multiple times lmao it doesn’t even take that long).
And so, the fate of the Blue and Ugly Child lies in your hands!
summary: Dive into a short adventure you'll forget within 30 minutes of closing the game. What are you waiting for? Join the Blue and Ugly Child on an adventure in a peculiar world at night. A 2D visual novel where your choices matter and multiple endings await.
